summary: Uncle Sheogorath lets you know what to do when you are feeling chilly even AFTER draping a carcass over your shoulders.
descriptionHtml:
My newest Uncle Sheo mod! This time it covers Frostfall, the brilliant hypothermia mod by Chesko. Link here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11163 It adds all sorts of things, backpacks, cloaks, exposure (a system that makes it even MORE stupid to go skinny-dipping in the frozen north), and best of all (OK, perhaps not BEST), loading screens! My specialty! 

And please, upload pictures for me.

My other Uncle Sheo Mods:

JaySuS: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24780
Phenderix: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24884
Climates of Tamriel: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24865
Hearthfire: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31820
Dawnguard: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31766
author: Nonmeatbag
